definitions.definition: Any of several temperate succulent plants of the family Crassulaceae , that have clusters of purple flowers, especially Hylotelephium telephium .
A yellow pigment of various degrees of intensity , sometimes approaching red .

main_definition: Any of several temperate succulent plants of the family Crassulaceae , that have clusters of purple flowers, especially Hylotelephium telephium .
secondary_definitions: A yellow pigment of various degrees of intensity , sometimes approaching red .
